name: Muse (a space frog, Enemursenpai)
description:
Eurydice has been captured! Quickly, you must venture into the forest and save your loving wife before disaster strikes! Equipped with a lyre, strike down your foes with musical notes.

This game was developed over a week during a local game jam. Wyatt and Nathalie are junior developers who are just beginning their journey into the world of game development. Wyatt wrote all code for the game whilst Nathalie produced all art assets. The two are a part of TCF Studio (Two Careless Friends), and this is technically our first release!

Any and all feedback/criticism is welcome!

Note that all assets are the intellectual property of TCF Studio, do not use them without permission!
